# Nouns Capture App Expansion

# Nouns Capture App Expansion Proposal

## Table of Contents
1. [Introduction](#introduction)
2. [MVP Release and Success](#mvp-release-and-success)
3. [How the App Works](#how-the-app-works)
4. [Expansion Plan](#expansion-plan)
5. [Proven Success in EdTech](#proven-success-in-edtech)
6. [Nouns ROI: Benefits to the Nouns DAO](#nouns-roi-benefits-to-the-nouns-dao)
7. [Nouns Capture at NFT Conferences and Events](#nouns-capture-at-nft-conferences-and-events)
8. [Budget Breakdown](#budget-breakdown)
9. [Project Timeline: 4-Month Roadmap to Success](#project-timeline-6-month-roadmap-to-success)
10. [Ongoing Support and Maintenance](#ongoing-support-and-maintenance)

---

## 📖 Introduction
We propose a funding request of 35,000 USDC to expand the Nouns Capture app, an interactive scavenger hunt that educates school-aged students globally about Nouns and key Web 3 concepts in a fun and engaging way. Currently available for iOS, our expansion plan includes developing an Android version of the app, a worldwide launch to tens of thousands of school students globally, and full connected curriculum integration.

---

## 🏆 MVP Release and Success
The Nouns Capture app has already been released as a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) on iOS and has received an overwhelmingly positive response. [Download Here](https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/nouns-capture/id6447956444?uo=2)  

So far, with a word-of-mouth silent launch, we've had 3522 Educational Downloads. This represents schools and educational institutions downloading the app to explore Nouns in their contexts. The MVP showcases the potential of the app as a powerful educational tool, with students across the globe in our beta audience actively engaging with the platform. This early success is a testament to the app's strong foundation, and we aim to build upon this momentum with the proposed expansion.

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.57.42-am.png)

---

## 🎮 How the App Works
The Nouns Capture app allows anyone to find and collect Nouns hidden within barcodes/QR codes in their real environments. By scanning these barcodes using the app, students unlock the hidden Nouns and can store them in their digital journal. Best of all, No setup is required as Nouns are already hiding in every barcode/QR code on earth right now. 

As they progress through the game and collect more Nouns, students are also presented with opportunities to learn about Web 3 concepts. The app encourages exploration and learning in an engaging and interactive way, helping students gain a deeper understanding of the Nouns ecosystem and the broader principles of Web 3 technology.

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.57.48-am.png)
---

## 📈 Expansion Plan
### 🤖 Android Development
As part of our expansion, we will develop an Android version of the Nouns Capture app to ensure maximum reach and accessibility. This will significantly increase the app's user base and allow students with Android devices to enjoy the same engaging educational experience as their iOS counterparts.

### 🎨 UI Refinement: Unveiling a Nounish Aesthetic
While our current app serves as a functional MVP with essential UI and UX features, it's merely a stepping stone to what we envision. We're excited to bring to life an elevated user interface that embodies a distinct Nounish aesthetic, complete with harmonious colors and fonts. This refined design aims to not only enhance user engagement but also to resonate deeply with our target audience.

### 🏋️ Global Launch to 20,000 PE Teachers
With an exceptional track record of delivering experiences used by hundreds of thousands of students worldwide, our marketing efforts have consistently demonstrated successful results. The ConnectedPE team has a direct email list audience of 20,000 PE teachers who rely on us for innovative educational solutions. 

The Nouns Capture app will be globally launched to our entire audience, offering Nouns an incredible opportunity to reach the next generation of students worldwide. The core experience of the Nouns Capture app is highly relevant in PE contexts, as scavenger hunts promote an engaging blend of movement, exercise, and fun. This app provides the perfect experience for students to stay active and learn about the Nouns ecosystem while moving around.

### 📚 Integration with School Curricula
Our audience of teachers appreciates turnkey solutions that provide immediate value in their classrooms. To make this possible, we develop world-class, curriculum-aligned lesson plans that can be easily implemented. Our goal is to seamlessly integrate the Nouns Capture app into school curricula worldwide. By incorporating the app into students' learning, we ensure they gain valuable knowledge about key Web 3 concepts and other core subject areas while engaging with the Nouns ecosystem in a fun and interactive manner. [Download Our Sample Lessons](https://connectedpe.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/Nouns_20Lesson_20Plans.pdf)

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.58.01-am.png)
---

## 🌟 Proven Success in EdTech: Global Impact & Engagement 🌟
Our apps are already used by hundreds of thousands of students yearly across the globe, with impressive success stories such as:  

 1. [Move It](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/move-it/kopilngnmfklhhjocdfdlokmodibcbmk): A brain break Chrome extension for students with 98 million pageviews.
 2. [Balance It](https://apps.apple.com/au/app/balance-it-task-cards/id630956844): An interactive mobile app for teaching gymnastics and balance skills, with over 1 million downloads.
 3. [Sports Tracker](https://sportstrackerapp.com/): A school sports software with over 330,000 student accounts.  

These achievements demonstrate our dedication to creating and delivering high-quality experiences that resonate with students and educators worldwide, as well as our capacity to effectively reach & shape these audiences.



---

## 💡 Nouns ROI: Benefits to the Nouns DAO
### 🌍 Real-Life Proliferation of Nouns
The Nouns Capture app offers a unique opportunity to expand the Nouns brand's reach among the global school student body, targeting a vast and diverse audience. By launching the app to our network of 20,000 PE teachers, we will introduce thousands of students to the Nouns ecosystem. While many proposals focus on Web 3 users, we believe that true proliferation stems from making Nouns known in traditional contexts. Schools serve as an ideal avenue for genuine proliferation, as they bridge the gap between the digital world and everyday life, providing an immersive and educational experience for students to learn about and engage with the Nouns ecosystem.

### 🤝 Engage the Next Generation
The World Economic Forum estimates that over 1 billion people will be using blockchain-based systems by 2030, and much of this future audience is currently in today's schools. By introducing Nouns and Web 3 to students early on, we can help cultivate a knowledgeable user base familiar with the Nouns ecosystem and contribute to the broader Web 3 community. We plan to do this via in-app education and interactive experiences.

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.58.09-am.png)

---

## 🎤 Nouns Capture at NFT Conferences and Events
Nouns Capture will be a valuable tool that can be leveraged at NFT conferences and events as an innovative and engaging way to educate attendees about Nouns and Lil Nouns. By utilizing Nouns Capture in these situations, we aim to create memorable experiences for participants and generate enthusiasm for the Nouns ecosystem.  
Here's a simple scenario illustrating how Nouns Capture can be effectively utilized at NFT conferences and events:  
- Attendees are informed about the Nouns Capture activity during the event's opening announcements or through promotional materials distributed before the event.
- They are instructed to download the Nouns Capture app on their smartphones to participate in the activity.
- The event organizers have strategically placed Nouns hidden within QR codes throughout the venue. These QR codes could be located at various points of interest, such as exhibits, booths, or food and beverage stations.
- Attendees use the Nouns Capture app to scan and collect the hidden Nouns as they explore the venue and engage with the event's programming.
- As they collect Nouns, participants also learn about Web 3 concepts and the Nouns ecosystem, further enhancing their understanding and connection to the Nouns brand.
- Upon completion of the activity, attendees return to the Nouns booth to prove their captures by showing their in-app journal containing the collected Nouns.
- Event organizers reward the participants with prizes, such as exclusive NFTs, merchandise, or event passes, creating a memorable and engaging experience for attendees.

---

Creating and maintaining impactful educational experiences for students worldwide is at the heart of our business. The ConnectedPE team is fully committed to providing ongoing support and maintenance for the Nouns Capture app as an integral part of our app portfolio. This commitment comes without any additional cost from the DAO.

# Nouns Meetups

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeiesm2sbkxovkjh2xwigdntehw3i2zre5vwdv6nuobjjdvj3odlkeq)

There's so many Nounsfolk residing in different cities around the world. Since the early bitcoin days, meetups have helped people gather around emerging crypto movements. Nouns should be no different, so let's exploit the full feature set of candidate proposals, and source hosts for Nouns Meetups in their cities.

## People among Places doing Things

We've all come to appreciate the power of IRL events, but until recently, we've focused mostly on top-down gatherings. I'm proposing a grassroots movement of intimate local meetups of Nounsfolk around the world. Each host would be streamed 3 ETH per month for facilitating such, with 1.5 ETH as remuneration and the remaining 1.5 ETH for expenses. 

## One Meet, Every Month, Forever

I can imagine discussions around Web3 evolving into in-person Prop House pitches, Nounish hackathons, builder support groups, and some epic brainstorming sessions. If genuine grassroots movements begin to emerge from various cities around the world, we'd be fine tuning our serendipity machine with a breadth of healthy competition. Facilitators would be encouraged to source and host other builders from outside the Nouniverse and do their best to record, document, and broadcast panel discussions, AMA sessions, workshops, and whatever else they can dream up.

## Nouns Meetup Sydney

I'd like to request 3 ETH to host an inaugural meetup alongside [SXSW Sydney](https://sxswsydney.com/) during 15-22 October 2023. Followed by a 3 ETH monthly stream starting 1 November 2023, for a trial period of 5 months (a total of 6 months if you include the pilot event). To make the absolute most of what candidate proposals have to offer, I'd also like to invite pre-proposal feedback, including nominations for whoever else is interested in hosting a monthly Nouns Meetup in their city.

## Lets Meet?

Opt-ins from 12 locations for example, would cost us 36 ETH per month over 6 months, for a total of 216 ETH. As nominations are received and interest is confirmed, this proposal can be edited with nominee details and associated transactions, prior to being sponsored and going onchain for voting.

Shall we call it in?

[Gami](https://gami.wtf)

## An opportunity to scale 🌐

The first phase proved that beer is an excellent product to start proliferation on a global scale. We are seeking funding to expand our actions in three complementary strategic directions:

**1) New regions 📍**
‎ 
![](https://i.imgur.com/4iKllzi.png)

Narcose is already part of a network of regular collaborative breweries, through which it markets its beers in the US and Europe. We will take Public Good Beer to these markets, also integrating them into our onboarding ecosystem and turning them into real Nouns builders.

We are asking for 4350 USDC for label printing, marketing material, initial beer production (minimum 1500 cans/bottles), and aftermovies/content production FOR EACH of our partners:

**Canil** (Portugal) 🇵🇹 - already committed to 1500 bottles and will launch in October, ahead of various crypto events such as ZKdevsummit, Dune Con, ETH Lisbon, EBS2023, Nearcon and Web Summit, all happening in November.

**Stillwater Brewery** (Seattle) 🇺🇸
**Against the Grain** (Kentucky) 🇺🇸
**Wooden Ship** (Minneapolis) 🇺🇸
**Brewski** (Sweden) 🇸🇪
**Bierol** (Austria) 🇦🇹

If breweries exclusively produce the subsidized batch, Nouns' maximum cost per can or bottle, which includes premium beer, label printing, a launch event, and ongoing marketing and sales throughout the batch, is only 2.90 USD. Should the brewery opt for a larger batch, as is the case in Brazil, or produce a second batch independently, this cost significantly decreases.

Additionally, the impact of the funding goes beyond a single event. It serves as a **catalyst for wider influence and regular integration of Nouns into everyday culture.** This is evident in the growing number of [reviews](https://untappd.com/b/cervejaria-narcose-public-good-ipa/5389905) on the popular Untappd app (over 70 to date), spontaneous shares on social media, adoption by various Gnars-related activities in Brazil, featuring in the Nounish Punk game, and our successful production management in Portugal.

👉 **Accelerating Public Good Beer expansion not only brings legitimacy but also sustains a lasting cultural impact for Nouns.**

**BUDGET: 6x 4350 = 26100 USDC**

![](https://i.imgur.com/jvG8dTb.png)
‎ 
**2) Proper marketing in Brazil 🇧🇷**
‎ 
International expansion will not be instantaneous, as it demands a free schedule in the industry. In this period, we take advantage of the remaining inventory of over 3000 cans produced. 

Despite the success of Phase 1, we believe we haven’t reached the full IRL proliferation potential for such a pioneer project. We had 0.5 ETH for everything (sub-300 cans and a very short-scale marketing activation). Thus, the proposed expansion would bring the deserved impact and tons of resources for further promotion of the Nouniverse.

We are requesting 4350 USDC per quarter for the next six months to fund the activities below. We commit to at least one IRL event every quarter, but given the rapid growth of the Nouns community in Brazil, we anticipate numerous opportunities to engage with new fans.

- Public Good Beer distribution
- Marketing materials (shirts, stickers, temporary tattoos, and more)
- Brand activations
- Professional media production

**BUDGET: 2x 4350 = 8700 USDC**

![](https://i.imgur.com/5JpkcCz.gif)
‎
**3) New product categories 👀**
‎ 
Beyond beer, we have the opportunity to extend the portfolio to two synergic brands/categories:

a) BBQ sauces - for the weekly beer-fueled barbecues we do in Brazil; and
b) Sunscreen - for our community along 7637 km of coastline, with bikinis, surf stars, and sunglasses ⌐◨-◨ 

We would like to allocate a total budget of 5000 USDC for working on this as the project progresses. Alongside this, we also have the coordination and maintenance of the activities during the period of six months at a cost of 6000 USDC.

# Wet Butt, So What? Noun’s Bidet Revolution!

![7yrfsm|360x202](https://global.discourse-cdn.com/standard17/uploads/lilnouns/original/1X/cabbf3a0f8ac0e780c24f7becadad5b494f530ba.gif)


# **Wet Butt, So What? Noun's Bidet Revolution!** 

# Summary 

With the $38,000 proposal funding, MakeWater is set to ignite a bathroom culture revolution in the U.S. Our pilot project will distribute free Nouns-branded bidets to low-to-middle-income households. The budget covers bidet purchase, installation, and an educational campaign that empowers students to become citizen scientists. They will gather and share data on bidet usage, cost savings, and environmental impact. Installation guides, student water facility field trips,  and video diaries of our journey will further enrich public understanding of this sustainable practice. Our model is designed for scalability, ensuring continual bidet distribution in the long term.




# How will it work?
[![Screen Shot 2023-09-20 at 10.20.35 AM|690x388](https://global.discourse-cdn.com/standard17/uploads/lilnouns/original/1X/64fdc44ca71b4895023689cf724500b0b393e1b8.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zr56zofQX2o)
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zr56zofQX2o](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zr56zofQX2o)

Our  journey will start with our pilot program in South Texas which will be a pivotal step for data collection, refining strategies, and pinpointing best practices. We are delighted to have already gained the enthusiastic support and active engagement of local utilities and educators,  who will propel the growth of our community and our vision.
Through our ongoing community-building efforts, we will strive to gather a strong initial group of participants in South Texas, our pilot region. Far from being just beneficiaries, these participants will become pioneers, actively contributing to data collection and shaping a communal narrative through social media engagement. These authentic stories, personal experiences and testimonials,  will initiate a cultural shift towards bidet use and create a united front against water wastage.
The Nouns DAO can kickstart this effort, providing the initial push needed to get the ball rolling. But this isn't just a one-time splash; it's a tide of transformation! The real heart of this initiative is its ability to keep going on its own. Our goal is more than just handing out affordable bidets; it's about making a lasting change in how people use bathrooms in America.
This initiative will be a wave of change that keeps building and reaching farther. Our pilot program marks the first splash, but together, we have the power to reshape perspectives, enhance water sustainability, and fundamentally revolutionize water habits across the United States.



# Why Bidets?
Enter the humble toilet-mounted bidet — a nifty contraption that adds a touch of luxury to your bathroom routine. It replaces or fits beneath the toilet seat and uses a a nozzle to spray water for cleansing. Its installation is easy and doesn't demand a plumbing professional. Many models even showcase features like adjustable pressure, temperature control, and self-cleaning. Beyond all that, however, lies an ecological marvel— a cost-effective solution that promotes better hygiene while reducing toilet paper waste.

Bidets have garnered worldwide recognition for their remarkable water-saving abilities and paper-reducing magic. Embracing bidets translates to preserving trees, conserving water, and reducing the energy dedicated to manufacturing and transporting toilet paper.

Their appeal isn't just environmental; it's also rooted in hygiene. Bidets offer hands-free, pristine cleanliness, an invaluable health advantage, especially in a time when global health awareness is at its peak.

Our aging water infrastructure poses yet another challenge. Sewage systems of many cities groan under the weight of non-degradable items. These infrastructures were designed for a different era, and non-degradable products like wet wipes weren't part of the plan. Despite their convenience, wipes don't break down in water like toilet paper does. This leads to stubborn blockages, damages to equipment, and ultimately, significant repair costs that households and communities have to bear.

Bidets, however, offer a sustainable lifeboat. By adopting bidets, we curtail clogs and damages, sparing households and cities from hefty repair costs. It's not just a bathroom upgrade; it's a blueprint for economic resilience, environmental harmony, and public health.





## Our Background

![79685689a8627fcb69f5c7a138529474869a119a_2_1034x748|690x499](https://global.discourse-cdn.com/standard17/uploads/lilnouns/optimized/1X/79685689a8627fcb69f5c7a138529474869a119a_2_1034x748.jpeg)

# The First Triple Backflip on a Wheelchair - Extension

![Imgur](https://i.imgur.com/cxBCuHM.png)
[The First Triple Backflip on a Wheelchair - Part 1 on Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KQRoLU0QxYg)

In Prop 256, Nouns sent Wheelz on the hero’s journey of becoming the first person to do a triple backflip on a wheelchair. 

After three months, we’ve made so much progress - we’ve created a wheelchair that will work for our purposes, we’ve spent days practicing the triple into the foam pits of Woodward, and we’ve spent days practicing on the mega ramp in Utah. We’re so close to the triple but weren’t able to land one on our exhibition day in Utah. 

In this candidate, we’re asking for an extension to continue our work towards breaking this world record. With this prop, we will be able to work for 3 more months - taking our learnings and doubling down on the things that are working. We will be focusing more on perfecting the triple rotation and plan on making a week long trip to BMX legend Ryan William’s mega ramp in Australia where we believe we will get enough air time for Wheelz to do a triple.

![Imgur](https://i.imgur.com/PEscmiI.jpg)
[Here is Ryan’s mega ramp and him nailing a bmx triple backflip on it](https://youtu.be/G-jXjLA4OYg?t=300)

Ryan's ramp has all of the elements that will make this triple possible - a longer runway and a ramp with more pop compared to the ramp we used in Utah will give Wheelz more air time to get those 3 rotations. We're confident that this ramp will be where the world record will be broken.

When the triple is landed, our plan is to combine Part 1 and the footage from Australia to create a 15-18 min documentary which will be released on all socials. We also plan on working with Guinness Book of World Records to have our footage of the triple proliferated through their socials as well.

Message for @dorculas (ex-Noun 64): 
Wheelz is an absolute force and spending this time with him made me realize that he embodies so many more nounish qualities than I first thought. He’s an incredible creative builder and puts every ounce of his energy into the wheelchairs he makes. He’s a man for the people and seeing him interact with the kids at Woodward was such a delight. And he’s relentless in his pursuit to bring something that has never been seen in this world. I have full confidence in his ability to nail this trick and I hope you all can help us see this through.

**The Ask**

- **The First Triple Back Flip in a Wheelchair**
    - Wheelz (3 month extension) - $45,000
    - Ramp Rental, Ramp Marketing Materials - $15,000
    - Transportation, accommodations, admin - $5,000
- **Content Team**
    - An epic “Part 2” documentary featuring Wheelz (2 shooters, 1 audio, 1 editor) - $20,000
    - Transportation, accommodations, admin - $7,500

**Total - $92,500 USDC**

# 1 ETH Test: Stacking Treasury Yield With Origin Ether

![OETH Graphic](https://imageupload.io/ib/7wHXLUdXjhsKHYD_1695230412.png)

**TL;DR**: 

I am Peter from the Origin Protocol core team. This is a proposal for a (very) low-risk test to earn yield for the Nouns treasury by utilizing Origin Ether ([OETH](https://oeth.com/)). Converting 1 ETH into 1 OETH (they are 1:1) for 30 days would act as a case study to test that Nouns can safely earn high risk-adjusted yields for the treasury by utilizing OETH. 

Origin Protocol is an OG team that launched in 2017. We launched OETH about 4 months ago, with the goal of making it possible for retail users to earn the same kind of yields that institutional traders earn, without needing millions of dollars and a full-fledged trading team. OETH deploys collateral to blue-chip protocols, distributing the yield back to holders daily via positive rebase. Current OETH yield is 8.01% APY on ETH, or about 2x that of the largest LSTs. 

We have seen much larger test case props to Nouns ([Prop 320 for example](https://nouns.wtf/vote/320)); in our opinion this is much too large of an amount to test a new technology with, which is why we are proposing to begin with a 1 OETH test, and can submit an additional proposal in the future for an increased amount as the Nouns community becomes more familiar with OETH. 

This proposal will include two transactions: the first to convert 1 ETH into 1 OETH, and the second to opt the Nouns wallet in for yield generation.

A more detailed overview on the proposal and on how OETH works can be found below. 

![OETH Graphic](https://imageupload.io/ib/3Uu8NmrrBr6axiU_1695230390.png)

## Stacking Treasury Yield With OETH

Previous Relevant Proposals:
18 - [Stake 1 eth in Lido](https://nouns.wtf/vote/18)
22 - [Stake 10% of treasury in Lido](https://nouns.wtf/vote/22)
30 - [Stake additional 10% of treasury in Lido](https://nouns.wtf/vote/30)
52 - [Increase Treasury stETH Position to ~20%](https://nouns.wtf/vote/52)
217 - [Stake additional 5000 ETH in Lido](https://nouns.wtf/vote/217)
227 - [Stake additional 5000 ETH in Lido](https://nouns.wtf/vote/227)
313 - [stETH peg protection](https://nouns.wtf/vote/313)
320 - [Treasury Diversification](https://nouns.wtf/vote/320)

**Summary**: 

This is a proposal to convert 1 ETH into 1 Origin Ether ([OETH](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/origin-ether)) to test OETH yield generation for the Nouns treasury.

**Abstract**:

This is a low-risk test to increase the yield of the Nouns treasury ETH/stETH from 0-4% to 8-10% utilizing Origin Ether (OETH). Converting 1 ETH into 1 OETH for 30 days would form a similar hypothesis as proposal 18 - in this case, that Nouns can safely stack yields utilizing OETH. 

**Motivation**:

From proposals 18, 22, 30, 52, 217, and 227, it is clear that the Nouns DAO was interested in earning yield on the treasury and extending the project runway. Proposal 313 signals that the community would prefer to continue earning yield with stETH, instead of eliminating risk completely and converting entirely back to ETH. Proposal 320 signals that other mainnet LSTs can be useful for treasury diversification. 

The OETH TVL has been trending upwards at a rate of about $1m per day since launch and has been crushing it in comparison to direct competitors with the yield we are generating. OETH yield is currently at 8.01% APY, whereas icETH APY is down to 2.94% and Cian stETH strategy is down to 4.02% despite taking leverage.

We are proposing to begin with 1 OETH, and can submit an additional proposal in the future to increase the amount as the community becomes more familiar with OETH. OETH provides significantly increased yields while also protecting against centralization and slashing events. 


## OETH Overview

Origin Ether was launched in May 2023 and is an ERC20 LST aggregator that generates blue chip yield while sitting in your wallet. OETH is backed 1:1 by stETH, rETH, frxETH, ETH, and WETH at all times; holders can go in and out of OETH as they please. Similar to stETH, OETH yield is paid out daily and automatically (sometimes multiple times per day) through a positive rebase in the form of additional OETH, proportional to the amount of OETH held.

OETH yield, currently ~8.00% APY, comes from a combination of:

1. Deploying ETH/WETH on Curve, Convex, and Morpho
2. LST validator rewards
3. A 50bip exit fee is charged to those who choose to exit OETH via the [dapp](https://app.oeth.com/) (completely avoidable if using a DEX), this fee goes back to OETH holders
4. OETH sitting in non-upgradable smart contracts does not rebase, instead the interest generated from those tokens is provided to those that can rebase

These 4 yield generating functions combined enable OETH to generate higher yields than holding or farming any single LST manually. The current collateral allocation and yield strategies can be seen on-chain at all times via the [OETH analytics page](https://www.oeth.com/analytics). Future OETH collateral and yield strategies are governed by [OGV stakers](https://governance.ousd.com/stake).

Obtaining OETH is seamless, anyone can convert from ETH, stETH, rETH, or frxETH into OETH via any of the following methods:

- Minting on [OETH.com](https://app.oeth.com/)
- Swapping on [Curve](https://curve.fi/#/ethereum/pools/factory-v2-298/deposit)
- Swapping on [Uniswap](https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?inputCurrency=0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3&outputCurrency=ETH)
- Swapping on [Maverick](https://app.mav.xyz/pool?chain=1&tokenA=0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3&tokenB=0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2&fee=0.0004&width=0.001) 
- Swapping on [Sushiswap](https://app.sushi.com/swap?inputCurrency=ETH&outputCurrency=0x856c4Efb76C1D1AE02e20CEB03A2A6a08b0b8dC3&chainId=1)

For this proposal, Nouns will be using [The Zapper](https://docs.oeth.com/core-concepts/the-zapper) to convert the 1 ETH into 1 OETH. A second transaction will also be included to ensure the Nouns wallet is [opted-in for yield generation](https://docs.oeth.com/core-concepts/elastic-supply/rebasing-and-smart-contracts). 

**Benefits of Using OETH**

There are a few reasons for why Nouns would choose to use OETH over of attempting to use the same yield strategies: 

- The yield will always be higher with OETH than if you were to use any of the same yield strategies, since not all OETH is opted-in for yield, and because of the exit fee. At the moment 23,731 OETH is collecting yield and 21,280 is not, so Nouns would receive this boost in yield from the OETH opted-out. With the exit fee Nouns would get paid each time there's an exit - occasionally this puts the combined yield into the 100s!

- The Curve/Convex strategy would be very difficult (if not impossible) to replicate without having a Curve pool with a gauge + millions in TVL - Nouns would essentially need its own token and voting power and would be competing for yield with the other large flywheel token holders. 

- If Nouns were to do the same strategies, someone would need to manage the position. The OETH protocol would be that manager, with collateral reallocated among the whitelisted yield strategies each week. 

- The OETH protocol chases not just the highest yields but also the safest. During the weekend of March 10 when USDC and DAI depegged, it took the OUSD strategists/Origin engineers about 4 minutes to notice the depeg, and 16 minutes to start the process of moving the funds to a safer strategy. $0 were lost! 

- The OETH protocol covers all gas costs for moving funds between yield strategies, which is happening weekly but eventually will happen daily. With the price of gas on Ethereum, this could get costly for Nouns if Nouns were to follow the same reallocation schedule. 

- The cost for security - Origin has OpenZeppelin on retainer! Every new OETH contract is audited before going live. OETH security is prioritized over new feature development. The same level of security would cost Nouns millions of dollars in audit and development costs. 

- Top-notch development team - OETH shares 95% of the same code as OUSD, which has been live on mainnet for more than 3 years - longer than the Nouns DAO! The battle-tested code that has seen almost $400m combined has been and continues to be developed by a team of 10 full-time engineers. This level of talent required to maintain the smart contracts would be extremely expensive for Nouns, if Nouns were to try and replicate the OETH strategies. 


## Usage of Funds Generated

Since launch, OETH has earned a yield of about 2x that of stETH yield. With the extra yield generated for the Nouns treasury, there are several avenues for using the additional funds:

- Subsidizing public goods spend - Nouns traditionally spends ~800 ETH per month on public goods
- Subsidizing Nouns marketing - this would offset the cost for future Nouns movies, paid promotions, conference expenses, swag, and Noggles 
- Subsidizing Nouns infrastructure and auction expenses 
- Subsidizing cost for collaboration with other projects - Pudgy Penguins is just the beginning! 
- Funding large team efforts for less - it would take 50% of the stETH yield to fund another Nounish or Agora sized team effort
- Extended DAO runway - Nouns would extend the project runway twice as long


**Community Cases for Increased Yield**

I also don't think getting to our eth position to 100% staked eth limits our spending in any way… the ~500 ETH additional yield we'll get from staking the 10k ETH is not nothing. It's being able to fund another ~$1M / year sized team. That's like being able to fund another nounish or agora sized team effort, which is meaningful! - *Noun40*

I think the DAO should maintain around ~6mo of operating spend as ETH… diversify into other staking providers to reduce concentration risk. Overall in agreement with staking more ETH to increase runway. - *cfeng.eth*

The income generated from holding stETH also amounts to ~500 ETH / yr, which is more than 2 weeks of auctions. - *noun12.eth*

stETH is a better way of holding eth - *fugazi.eth*

I believe there is already too much of the treasury being staked in Lido. I am not interested in staking more, and if I were, I would want to use some other protocol that isn't Lido since we already have a lot in Lido. - *onnnnnnnion.eth*



## Potential Risks and Mitigation

There are six possible risks when using OETH, and Origin is making sure to reduce each risk as much as possible:

*New token risk* - Given OETH is a relatively new token, some may be worried that OETH is prone to new attack surfaces. While this may be true for other new tokens, OETH was built reusing 95% of the OUSD code, of which 10+ audits have been done since 2020. Not that long ago, [OUSD reached a market cap of $300m](https://defillama.com/protocol/origin-dollar) without breaking, and without diminishing the APY it was capable of generating. Origin continues to work on OUSD, despite the lower market cap.

*Counterparty risk* - OETH is governed by OGV stakeholders around the world. Everything from yield generation to fee collection and distribution is managed by a set of smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. These contracts are upgradeable with a timelock and are controlled by hundreds of governance token holders. While the initial contracts and yield-earning strategies were developed by the Origin team, anyone can shape the future of OETH by creating or voting on proposals, submitting new strategies, or contributing code improvements. We intend for all important decisions to be made through community governance and limited powers to be delegated to trusted contributors who are more actively involved in the day-to-day management of the protocol.

*Smart contract risk of the yield strategies* - Origin is only using platforms for yield generation that have a proven track record, have been audited, have billions in TVL, maintain a bug bounty program, and provide over-collateralized loans. Over-collateralization in itself, combined with liquidations, provides a reasonable level of security for lenders.

*Collateral risk* - Origin has chosen 3 of the largest LSTs to ever exist to back OETH, and they have maintained their peg quite well since launch. They have also demonstrated significant growth in circulating supply, so the Origin team is confident that the 3 LSTs will maintain their peg and that OETH will remain stable to ETH. To ensure accurate pricing at all times, OETH is using Chainlink oracles for pricing data for rETH and stETH, and a dual oracle for frxETH that combines two sources: the Curve frxETH/ETH EMA oracle and the Uniswap frxETH/FRAX TWAP oracle. In situations where any OETH collateral falls below peg, [OIP-4 disables minting](https://github.com/OriginProtocol/origin-dollar/issues/1000) of additional OETH tokens using the de-pegged asset.

*Slashing risk* - Since OETH is collateralized by multiple LSTs at the same time, OETH is protected from slashing from any individual collateral LST. If there is a small slash, the OETH yield will simply decrease, as income will likely exceed the size of the slash. During a major slashing event, both the slashed LST and OETH will experience a drop in value relative to ETH, but OETH should not fall as low and for as long as the slashed LST, as the remaining un-slashed OETH LSTs will soften the blow. There will never be a negative OETH rebase.

*Smart contract risk of OETH* - Origin is taking every step possible to be proactive and lessen the chance of losing funds. Security reviews are prioritized over new feature development, with regular audits being done, and multiple engineers are required to review each code change with a detailed checklist. There are timelocks before protocol upgrades are launched, and deep dives into the exploits of other protocols are constantly being done to make sure the same exploits don’t exist on Origin contracts. Security is extremely important to the Origin team. OETH was built reusing 95% of the OUSD code, of which 10+ audits have been done since 2020. All audits can be seen on [Audits - OETH](https://docs.oeth.com/security-and-risks/audits) , and OpenZeppelin is now on retainer. On-chain insurance protocol InsurAce awarded OETH and OUSD the [highest possible security rating of AAA](https://app.insurace.io/coverage/buycovers), of which only 3 other projects on the InsurAce platform have received. Optional OETH cover is currently available for both OETH and OUSD on InsurAce. Origin Defi also maintains a $1m bug bounty through [Immunefi](https://immunefi.com/explore/), with a resolution time of 7 hours. 


External OETH analysis:

[Llama Risk](https://cryptorisks.substack.com/p/asset-risk-assessment-origin-ether) - Asset Risk Assessment: Origin Ether (OETH)
[Auxo](https://mirror.xyz/auxo.eth/1NXxHhJmj44EfHmvA5pEH7mpSLtg-CbYRqmuEkaTRRk) - OETH - Protocol Analysis


OETH in the news:

[Coindesk](https://www.coindesk.com/tech/2023/05/16/origin-protocol-enters-competitive-ether-yield-market-with-oeth-offering/) - Origin Protocol Enters Competitive Ether Yield Market With OETH Offering 
[TokenInsight](https://tokeninsight.com/en/news/origin-protocol-launches-yield-aggregating-eth-derivative-called-oeth) - Origin Protocol Launches Yield Aggregating $ETH Derivative Called $OETH 
[Blockster](https://blockster.com/maximize-eth-staking-yields-with-oeth-a-yield-bearing-ether-pegged-token-by-origin-protocol) - Maximize ETH Staking Yields with OETH: A Yield-Bearing, Ether-Pegged Token by Origin Protocol 

**Closing Thoughts**

Peter is a core member of [Origin Protocol](https://originprotocol.com/) and is joined by the fully doxxed Origin team and community, which includes hundreds of thousands of members and open-source contributors. Many members of the Origin team, including both founders, are holding a significant portion of their personal wealth in OETH. Origin Protocol’s corporate treasury is also holding millions of dollars in OETH. We have skin in the game and are willing to put our own money at risk with the code we have written.

There are no lockups with this proposal, Nouns can move in and out of OETH as the Nouncil, core team, DAO, and community desires. OETH remains completely liquid at all times, and can be spent in the same way as its backing collateral, if unexpected expenses were to arise.

# Let's Build 🐝 Meliponarios & Share the Buzz about Nouns!

## TL;DR

- Purpose: Empower Maya Beekeepers, safeguard Melipona bees, and uphold ancient Mayan culture, all while proliferating the Nouns brand to locals and tourists to the Yucatan, Mexico.
- Benefits:
  - Boosting economic growth in Maya communities.👩🏽‍🌾🧑‍🌾
  - Create a real world space where Nouners, Nounders locals and tourists can actually visit...and get some medicinal, tasty honey!🍯
  - Enhancing ecological harmony & safeguarding Melipona Bees.🐝
  - Preserving and spotlighting ancient beekeeping traditions.🌎
  - Spreading the Nouns brand via the custom built Nouns Meliponarios.🚀
- Our Ask: 10 ETH.
  - Funds Breakdown:
    - 60% for construction of the Meliponario (bee yard).
    - 20% for construction of the "Bee the Future Maya Education Center".
    - 20% for admin, marketing, strategy and brand alignment with Nouns.

### Below is a real example of the bee yard (Meliponario) we envision building for Nouns! Sponsored by Nouns, this haven for bees will feature an informative board complete with a QR code to nouns.wtf, distinctive Noggles, and more. Imagine this sanctuary buzzing with visitors, stingless bees and all while showcasing the Nouns brand.
![One of our Meliponarios in Valladolid Mexico](https://europe1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/2X/8/868f0d349d5c2cd74187c015f891023190a297e1_2_690x460.jpeg)

## Overview: Mayan Bee Yards Sponsored by Nouns

[The Mayan Melipona Bee Sanctuary Project](MayanMeliponaBee.org) is a comprehensive initiative focused on empowering Maya Beekeepers, safeguarding the Melipona bees, and preserving ancient Mayan culture. This project provides communities with the necessary resources to establish bee apiaries, create sanctuaries for healthy bee populations, and facilitate the sale of precious Melipona honey. By contributing to this project, we are driving economic growth, ecological harmony, and cultural sustainability.


## What's a Meliponario?
A "meliponario" refers to a place or sanctuary where stingless bees, particularly from the genus Melipona (commonly found in Central and South America), are cultivated or kept. These bees are known for their production of honey with unique properties and have been traditionally kept by indigenous communities for centuries, especially by the Mayans. The practice of maintaining meliponarios is essential for conserving these bee species, promoting biodiversity, and maintaining cultural traditions related to beekeeping.

## Our Hive Team
Meet the dedicated team behind The Mayan Melipona Bee Sanctuary. Discover the passionate individuals working to preserve, protect, and promote the Melipona bees of the Yucatan and their vital role in our ecosystem.
![Our Hive Team](https://europe1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/2X/d/d650720abb790beebf5979a5c412778e1dfc6e9c_2_690x454.jpeg)

# Investing in the Growth of Nouns DAO in Japan🇯🇵

# TL;DR
[Nouns DAO Japan (NDJ)](https://discord.gg/a5467Y2bGs) is the largest Nouns community in Japan. [NDJ's Prop House](https://prop.house/nouns-japan)  has been a cornerstone of our growth and community engagement. However, we have noticed a decline in activity since our last round, Round-10. Consequently, this issue has been concerned many of us who see the immense potential in our local community.

One Major hurdle is the language barrier. Many Prop House events are in English, limiting the participation of our largely Japanese-speaking community.

To address this gap, we would like to kindly request your financial support to re-launch and sustain our Prop House for a period of one year. We believe this will boost Nouns DAO's brand awareness in Japan and create valuable content. We'll also look for self-funding options during this period. 

**Total ask: 18 ETH**.
- Rewards: 0.5 ETH * 5 props * 6 times = 15ETH
- Operations & Public Relations: 1 ETH/year * 3 persons = 3 ETH

# What is Nouns DAO Japan
Pokemon, Hello Kitty, Anpanman, Super Mario, Dragon Ball, One Piece, Naruto, etc... Japan is home to iconic characters and boasts a rich culture of derivative works and cosply. This cibrant creative scene serves as fertile ground for talented creators.

# Aburra (fka Alphacaster): Nouns x Farcaster

TL;DR: Requesting 28 ETH for Aburra (formerly Alphacaster) to explore the frontier of Nouns x Farcaster and build a best-in-class web3 social app. 50% retro and 50% forward funding.


### Overview

Farcaster represents a unique opportunity to decentralize Nouns communication and bring Nounishness to more onchain organizations.

At Aburra, we have been building at the intersection of Nouns and Farcaster since early 2023 and have won Nouns Hack Week for our MVP v1 in April.

Today, Aburra has evolved significantly since its v1. In addition to being both a Nouns client and a Farcaster client, it allows anyone to host Farcaster spaces where listeners can directly vote for proposals.

![Aburra iOS](https://i.imgur.com/Fm3kQS3.png)


Our ambition is not just to create the best Nouns client, but to make all DAOs more Nounish by helping them communicate on top of an open and permissionless protocol (i.e. Farcaster).

We also hope to use this prop to see what is possible when you combine two of the best web3 ecosystems - we want to push towards a future where open communication protocol is favored over Discord and Twitter.



### What Aburra has delivered so far

**Applications developed**
- [Alphacaster.xyz](https://Alphacaster.xyz) and WebView-based mobile apps ([iOS](https://testflight.apple.com/join/JLPtu4r8) and [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=xyz.alphacaster.app) - to be combined with the new app): DAO-specific Farcaster feed, governance notifications, enhanced proposal pages with cast-based comments etc.
- A proposal bot ([@alphabot](https://warpcast.com/alphabot)) to convert all props, votes, auctions and propdates into casts
- Beta Aburra app ([iOS](https://testflight.apple.com/join/uLiAhdUA) and web): Been testing it for two weeks and it now supports Farcaster space with native DAO integrations (proposal and voting)

![Nounish Emoji Reactions in Aburra](https://i.imgur.com/RQCt0fz.jpg)

**Current traction**
- Aburra has become the default way for Farcaster users to consume proposals and votes. In the last 30 days, it had 3.9K unique visitors. It also has Warpcast [integrations](https://warpcast.com/dwr.eth/0x3cec05).
![](https://i.imgur.com/oT7WtK7.png)

- Since we started testing the new app 2 weeks ago, we've hosted 7 Farcaster spaces for Nouns, Purple and Nouns Builder. 70 users have installed the [app](https://testflight.apple.com/join/uLiAhdUA). More Nounish spaces are in [the](https://warpcast.com/cr/0x8c0dd6) [pipeline](https://warpcast.com/toadyhawk.eth/0x64bd48).
![](https://i.imgur.com/rXUDxAX.png)

### Plan for the next 3 months
- Full integration with Farcaster channels, including reading Nouns channel directly in
the app (and in any space)
- Phase out the old Alphacaster app and merge all functionality into Aburra: this
includes implementing everything (governance feed, proposal pages etc.) natively,
instead of using WebView, which will significantly improve UX
- Better space UX, with native DAO features (NFT minting, droposal, smoother voting etc.)
- Integrate with more Nounish DAOs (and others!)
- Launch Android



### Team

Aburra has 2 full-time team members, billzh.eth ([@billzh](https://warpcast.com/billzh) on FC) and blingbling.eth ([@16](https://warpcast.com/16) on FC). Both of us are experienced developers and have built production-grade consumer applications.

So far we have received 12.9 ETH grants from Nouns Builder ([9 ETH](https://www.alphacaster.xyz/dao/BuilderDAO/prop/48)), Nouns Hack Week ([3 ETH](https://prop.house/nouns/hack-week-developers-developers-developers/5256)) and Warpcast ([~0.9 ETH](https://warpcast.com/v/0xd74872)).



### Ask

The ask is 28 ETH (0.2% of current treasury) to help us continue to build Aburra, specifically:
- 14 ETH retroactive funding for the past 4 months of developments (since our last Nouns BuilderDAO retro [funding](https://www.alphacaster.xyz/dao/BuilderDAO/prop/48))
- 14 ETH for the next 3 months of developments as outlined above

The team is lean and we are confident to deliver a top-tier application with significantly lower cost than comparable clients (House of Nouns at [95](https://nouns.wtf/vote/242) ETH, Agora at [220](https://nouns.wtf/vote/154) ETH and Prop Lot at [60](https://nouns.wtf/vote/244) ETH).

# Nouns Retro Awards

## TLDR
Every quarter, let's vote on past props to select ten props worthy of being awarded a noun. Proposers of winning props will be able to claim a noun of their choice from the treasury along with ETH equivalent to 1/3 of the recent 30 day auction price to assist with the tax burden of being awarded a noun. 

All props since inception should be eligible. Props are targets of voting in order to have an objective eligibility criteria as well as have the voting conversation centered around prop outcomes rather than people.

---

## Context

I've [long been an advocate](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/retro-house-retroactive-reward-house/1757) for some form of retroactive rewards towards our best props. It serves two goals of providing upside incentive that is missing currently (you're not financially incentivized to do well beyond just delivering the prop) along with providing a retrospective feedback moment that we can all learn from (all prop builders are incentivzed to give good prop updates since they want to win; nouns voters end up expressing onchain what props they value).

The last time we had a really concrete conversation around doing retroactive rewards for props was [this conversation](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-build-retro-house-retroactive-reward-house/1810/13). Yitong (pre-Agora) suggested leading this effort. It was well received as an idea but at the time we thought Prop House would ultimately handle retro rewards as well and decided to table implementation. Unfortunately, we got super side-tracked as a community and never really got to implementing something here. 

Season 3 is when we should finally make this happen. I suggest we have the prize be nouns instead of ETH since post-fork we also have the issue of how to distribute nouns in treasury (to avoid the burn!). This mechanism would distribute 40 nouns a year.

Another motivation is to reduce the burden of prop builders having to make the [awkward ask](https://www.nounsagora.com/proposals/371) of including nouns in their props. I would much rather it be proactively clear that if your prop is one of the best props of the quarter, you'll be getting a noun even without having made such negotiation ahead of funding.

# Proposal for Fire Safety, Community Recognition, and Commemorative Initiatives

## Summary
This proposal is an urgent plea for the allocation of 370 ETH and 20 Nouns to acquire a fire truck and implement associated measures aimed at protecting our valuable assets, particularly the Treasury, and ensuring the safety of our builders. Given the possibility that the treasury might actually be set on fire, we need to take immediate and comprehensive steps to mitigate risks, safeguard our builders, and manage the potential fallout effectively.

## Objectives
- Safety of Builders: Prioritize the safety of our esteemed builders who are integral to the progress and innovation within our ecosystem.
- Asset Protection: Acquire a fire truck to address the tangible risk of fire and protect our assets.
- Risk Mitigation: Secure an insurance policy to cover potential damages and losses.
Reputation Management: Hire a PR firm to manage communications and mitigate any reputational impact.

## Budget Allocation
The total ask for this proposal is 370 ETH and 20 Nouns, allocated as follows:

- Fire Truck Acquisition: 80 ETH
Purchase of a fire truck equipped with the necessary firefighting apparatus.
- Operational and Maintenance Costs: 20 ETH
Cover operational costs, including fuel and maintenance, for one year.
- Training and Certification: 10 ETH
Comprehensive training for designated personnel, focusing on the safety of builders.
- Insurance Policy: 40 ETH
Purchase of a comprehensive insurance policy to cover potential damages and losses.
- PR Firm Engagement: 50 ETH
Hiring of a reputable PR firm to manage communications and reputational risk.
- Gremplin Artwork on Fire Truck: 10 ETH
Commission Gremplin to hand-paint Noggles on the fire truck, adding a unique touch to our safety equipment.
- Fire Resistant Noggles by Klim: 20 ETH
Collaborate with Klim to manufacture special fire-resistant Noggles for the firefighters.
- Bravery Recognition: 20 Nouns
Award 20 Nouns to the brave firefighters who put their lives on the line for our community.
- Commemorative Blockspace by Dead Address: 30 ETH
Secure blockspace for headstones in the dead address to memorialize any Nouns lost in potential incidents.
- Commemorative Episode by TNS: 20 ETH
Sponsor TNS to create a special episode celebrating the achievements and contributions of the Nouns DAO community.
- Nouns on the Ground: 40 ETH
Provide funding to send Nouns on the Ground on a well-deserved holiday to Bora Bora Island as a token of appreciation for their contributions.

## Implementation Plan
- Acquisition and Customization: Procure the fire truck promptly and collaborate with Gremplin for the artistic customization.
- Safety Gear and Recognition: Work closely with Klim for the production of fire-resistant Noggles and organize recognition events for our firefighters.
- Memorialization and Celebration: Arrange for the commemorative blockspace and collaborate with TNS for the celebratory episode.
- Rejuvenation: Facilitate a rejuvenating holiday arrangement for some of our most esteemed proliferators.

## Benefits to Nouns DAO
- Enhanced Safety: Proactive measures ensure the safety of our builders and the protection of our assets.
- Community Morale Boost: Celebratory and commemorative initiatives foster a sense of unity and appreciation within the community.
- Reputation Assurance: Effective communication and reputation management strategies uphold the image of Nouns DAO.
- Reflection and Gratitude: Memorialization and appreciation initiatives cultivate a culture of reflection and gratitude.

## Conclusion
By allocating 370 ETH and 20 Nouns, we can implement a comprehensive set of measures and initiatives to enhance safety, celebrate our community, honor bravery, and reflect on our collective journey. This proposal represents a balanced approach to addressing immediate safety concerns while also fostering community spirit and appreciation.

Note: In case the treasury survives and the fire truck is not needed any excess funds will be used to purchase Moonbeans which will be sent to starving children in Africa.

# DAOpunk: A retroactive Nounish DAO for the CryptoPunks community

# DAOpunks
*tl;dr - A generalized protocol to "Nounsify" any existing NFT collection, starting with the CryptoPunks community in the form of a Punker DAO*

![DAOpunks Landing Page Preivew](https://imgur.com/oJlSew2)

**Mainnet Launch:** Today, Sept 26th, 2023
**Website:** [daopunks.wtf](https://daopunks.wtf)
**Twitter:** [@daopunks](https://twitter.com/cdaopunks)
**Discord:** [join](https://discord.gg/daopunks)

# Nounsifying an Existing Collection

We believe (i) the Nouns model is the most innovative and sustainable model for NFTs to date, and (ii) it should be made available to retrofit any existing collection.

Thus, we forked Nouns DAO and added 3 new features:

1. **Attribute rarity** - attributes can be rendered in the daily artwork based on weighted probabilities.

2. **Duplication prevention** - a registry is used to index the attributes of existing NFTs, which prevents the `NSeeder.sol` contract from ever creating any repeat artwork.

3. **Treasury co-ownership** - two collections are permitted to co-govern the DAO treasury: the new, Nouns-based collection plus an additional, existing collection.

These three features allow any community of an existing NFT collection to "Nounsify" themselves by introducing new artwork and a continuous source of collective revenue.

# Scope
1. We've taken this protocol and developed it for the CryptoPunks community first: 

    i. **Attribute rarity** - one new DAO Punk will be generated per day. The rarity of attributes will be approximately the same as CryptoPunks.
    ii. **Duplication Prevention** - we indexed all 10,000 CryptoPunks. No DAO Punks will ever be a duplicate of a CryptoPunk. Once a DAO Punk is minted, it is added to the index to prevent its own duplication.
    iii. **Treasury co-ownership** - One CryptoPunk = 1 vote. One DAO Punk = 1 vote.

2. This protocol will be generalized in partnership with [Zora](https://twitter.com/ourZORA) and [Builder DAO](https://nouns.build/dao/ethereum/0xdf9b7d26c8fc806b1ae6273684556761ff02d422/265) via [Nouns Builder](https://twitter.com/nounsbuilder) to create a ***Collections+*** protocol for any existing NFT community to "Nounsify" itself.

# Why start with CryptoPunks?
CryptoPunks is the [largest NFT collection by market cap](https://nftpricefloor.com/?sort=ranking&dir=asc), but is communally, completely cash poor. CryptoPunks were released by [Larva Labs](https://www.larvalabs.com/) on June 23rd, 2017 with a free mint price and zero trading fees. As a result, no community funds were ever accumulated, and Punk holders are unable to do any of the cool things Nouns holders get to do today.

Because CryptoPunk holders are so high profile, yet financially incapacitated, they are particularly susceptible to adopt a retrofitted, self-sustaining mechanism, like Nouns. This provides an especially high probability of success with this experiment.

If we can demonstrate a successful execution of the Nouns protocol for the CryptoPunks community, it will serve as an inspiration for all other prominent (but potentially nascent) NFT collections to Nounsify themselves, too. The success of a DAOpunks collection could easily become one of the largest proliferators of the Nouns ethos, while simultaneously catalyzing widespread NFT coordination and market sentiment for select and willing communities.

# Request

* 100 ETH transferred to seed the Nounsified DAO treasury for the CryptoPunks + DAOpunks community, collectively known as the Punkers DAO.

## Reasoning

The request is effectively structured as a 100 ETH delegation to the owners of all CryptoPunks in exchange for them adopting the Nouns model and distributing funds with comparable intent (and vibes).

Similar to Zora's [proposal #167](https://nouns.wtf/vote/167), we are requesting that NounsDAO pay it forward rather than reimburse us for:

* approximately 50 ETH worth of development we paid out of our own pocket.
* 12 months of time we spent independently researching, developing, and fine tuning the first  *Collections+* implementation.

We do not want reimbursement, we want proliferation!

## Deliverables

In return for seeding 100 ETH into the Punker DAO, we will (or have already):

* Deploy the implementation for the CryptoPunks community to mainnet
* Open source the codebase of this first Collections+ implementation
* Open source the research we conducted on CryptoPunks in building this project
* Open source the research we've begun for other collections
* Generalize the protocol in partnership with Zora & Builder DAO via Nouns Builder
* Steward the Punker DAO initiatives & community

## Generalizing the Protocol

> "If I had to suggest only one short term focus after L2 it would be funding and generalizing the Punks+ work by [@cr](https://warpcast.com/cr). Show up to the website and start a canon DAO for any existing project."
>`-` [Jacob Horne](https://twitter.com/js_horne), Founder of Zora ^[https://warpcast.com/jacob/0xabeab6] ([see also](https://warpcast.com/jacob/0xd00662))

CryptoPunks are dramatically different than other NFT collections:

* They do not use the ERC721 standard - they use ERC20
* They have multiple, mutually exclusive sub-classes of traits
    * *Example: `{hair, hat}` are in the same sub-class*
* They have single-attribute (non-class based) rules of exclusion
    * *Example: `welding goggles` are `glasses` that can be worn with `hair` but not with a `hat`*
* They have multiple visual implementations of the same attribute
    * *Example: `vr glasses` have 2 different pixel patterns depending on if the punk is `female` or not*

These unique characteristics, which are not found in other collections, required us to create a lot of custom logic. As a result, our codebase is not yet immediately generalizable.

To achieve a generalizable state, we will work in cooperation with Zora and Builder DAO to port our architecture into their Nouns Builder protocol, which is already extremely accessible and widely adopted. This port will allow any NFT community to deploy their own Nounified DAO using Zora's intuitive, no-code tools.

# Team
* I am [CBob.eth](https://twitter.com/CBobRobison), founder of [meTokens](https://twitter.com/metokens) and former [Hoard](https://twitter.com/hoardexchange), [Golem Foundation](https://twitter.com/GolemFoundation), and OMG Network team member. I presented the first ever talk on NFT Utility at ETHBerlin in 2018, and have since spoken at DevCon, NFT.NYC, NIFTY (first ever NFT hackathon), the ECF’s Non-Fungible Summit, and more. I acquired [CryptoPunk #4330](https://cryptopunks.app/cryptopunks/details/4330) in 2018 for 0.15 ETH ($34 at the time).

* [FR3UD](https://twitter.com/FR3UD_) is the founder of the NFT Cambridge meetup and former Risk & Data Analyst at [Coinbase](https://twitter.com/coinbase), [Binance US](https://twitter.com/BinanceUS), [MoonPay](https://twitter.com/moonpay), and [Wyre](https://twitter.com/sendwyre). He is a day one holder of The Proof Collective pass and an active member of the Moonbirds community.
---

***Disclaimer**: this project is **NOT** affiliated with Yuga Labs. It has, however, received guidance from both the Yuga Labs legal team and their CryptoPunks division.*

By executing this proof of concept, we anticipate the following outcomes:
* **Successful Integration**: Demonstrate that the Nouns character can be seamlessly incorporated into the world of "Ed B: The Puppet," preserving the series' identity while enhancing its diversity.

* **Alignment with Nouns DAO Values**: Showcase our commitment to promoting diversity and inclusivity, which closely aligns with the mission of Nouns DAO.

This proof of concept will serve as a preview, allowing us to craft full episodes that comprehensively showcase the Noun’s unique attributes and contributions to the series.

We firmly believe that this project not only serves to proliferate the Nouns, but further presents a unique opportunity to showcase the Nouns as trailblazers in fostering inclusivity and thought-provoking entertainment.

# Series Creative Overview

## SERIES LOGLINE

Meet Ed B “The Puppet”. He’s a fatalistic struggling music artist just trying to make it. Everyday Ed B faces a new challenge – having to fight off racists at Trader Joes while perusing the vegan aisle, or running butt ass naked for a couple of dollars to pay his rent, OR having to sell photos of himself on the internet to help fund his next record – BUT they never stop him from pushing towards his dream of becoming the Beyoncé of puppets.

* 10-12 minute web(3)isode
* Stop motion and mixed media animation.

# Pilot Episode

## SYNOPSIS

“A Song About Black Love” - Infatuated by a blossoming love interest, Ed B works out a new song about the joys of Black love. Billy, Ed’s bandmate, roommate and white ally, questions a hidden secret within Ed’s relationship and mayhem ensues.

“A Song About Black Love” was self funded by Ed Balloon in 2022 primarily through the sale of NFTs. To help uplift other artists, Ed Balloon pledged 50 percent of the collection’s secondary sales toward The Ed Balloon Generational Wealth Fund, which collects work from Black and other under-represented artists in Web3.

# Nouns Stories + Stoopid Buddy = Shorts Galore

## TLDR

On the heels of [Prop 180](https://nouns.wtf/vote/180)’s and [Prop 73](https://nouns.wtf/vote/73)’s overwhelming success, we’re rallying the creative forces once again on what promises to be our biggest and most impactful proposal yet. Nouns Stories is seeking $1,795,000 to develop, produce and distribute over 50 Animated Nouns Short Shorts on a global scale with nine time-Emmy Award winners Stoopid Buddy Stoodios, along with 50 of the best animators in the world.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyIYuo7gp.png)

[Nouns Short Shorts Trailer](https://youtu.be/QxrvHepTh38)

## NOUNS: FRONT AND CENTER

Most sources of financing for animated content are tied to networks that move at a snail’s pace and that are not considered artist friendly. This is where Nouns Stories steps in to disrupt the system. We want to provide the proper funding to attract the world’s best animators, help them bring their ideas to life, and in so doing — put Nouns DAO on the map as the number one source for innovative, diverse storytelling in short-form animation. 

Not only that, but by making Nouns DAO the seed funder we’re putting the Nouns IP (and the brand’s aesthetic) front and center on a series of innovative and hilarious shorts that are bound to get massive amounts of attention with animation fans all around the world. What better way to spread the Nounish vibes and garner some positive attention?

## PERSON, PLACE & THING: 3 THEMATIC ROUNDS, 50 CREATORS, 1 YEAR

Over the course of the next twelve months we’ll onboard 50 of the world’s most innovate animators to create engaging animated shorts featuring great characters, engaging storylines, and Nounish vibes. By expanding the run times and upping the budgets, we’ll give the animators the opportunity to produce even MORE engaging visuals and storylines!

We’ll roll out the animated shorts over three themed rounds:

- Round 1 - stories about theme 1
- Round 2-  stories about theme 2
- Round 3 - stories about *theme 3*

Other than requiring the films to feature Nouns characters or Noggles, we’ll encourage the animators to go absolutely wild with the best and funniest ideas: the ones that may not exist within the walled gardens of Hollywood. Because not every artist has the bandwidth to produce longer form shorts, we’ll keep the short short 15 second+ format for some of our creators. 

In total the three themed rounds will feature:

- 12 x 2-3 minute S*horts*
- 38 x 15-30 second S*hort Shorts*
- 3 original shorts by the team at Stoopid Buddy

## 50 OF THE WORLD’S BEST

We’ll cast our net wide to onboard the best animators we can muster, and by allowing them the creative freedom to ***************do what they do***************, we believe we’ll get the very best out of them. Not only that, but many of these talented folks already have huge followings online which will further expose the Nouns DAO to their legions of fans when we go live with the shorts.

## 3 STOOPID SHORTS

To kick off each thematic round, Stoopid Buddy Stoodios will pour all of their Nouns-lovin’-energy (see: Rose Parade / forthcoming Nouns Documentary) into making something truly special for Nouns — a love letter in animation like only they can. They’ll tap their A-list Buddies to create and voice these fully original mini-movies, creating some hilarious cohesion to what promises to be a wildly eclectic program!

## CC0 Heroes

As we did in the first Nouns Short Shorts Festival, we’ll encourage each animator to embrace Nounish culture by opting in to making their shorts CC0. While it won’t be required, opting into to CC0 will make their films eligible for some damn [fine awards](https://twitter.com/nouns_stories/status/1670029456688418818) and cash prizes!

## OH YEAH…ONE MORE THING

We’ll be hosting a *nountastic* IRL animation festival to premiere these amazing shorts, attracting nounish animation fans from all over the world.   Why do this when we could just hide behind the safety of our computer monitors? Because as we experienced with the first screening at [Braindead Studios](https://studios.wearebraindead.com/) in Los Angeles (in conjunction with the Melbourne screening at Pixel), there’s an *energy* and *magic* to bringing communities together to share in a truly unique experience that will help put Nouns DAO on the map. We’ll invite all our industry pals, and will we live-stream the whole thing just as we did before? Abso-fucking-lutely!

## IMPACT: NETWORK EFFECT

The first round of shorts garnered over a million views in the first month of release. Most of these views were native to the creator channels of the animators themselves — providing a whole new audience for Nouns. This time around, we’ll not only continue to seek out animators with their own audiences, but amplify views across all platforms with a social media marketing campaign and enlisting a PR firm to bolster [awareness](https://www.animationmagazine.net/2023/07/stoopid-buddy-stoodios-chris-waters-unzips-about-the-nouns-short-shorts-festival/) of what we’re up to. On top of this, to build anticipation and excitment for the festival as the year unfolds, we'll create original promotional content, including teasers and trailers, behind the scenes footage, and creator profiles.

## THE NOUNS STORIES TEAM

**Stoopid Buddy Stoodios**

9 time Emmy-winning studio behind *Robot Chicken,* and producer of over 1,000 hours of animated television **including: *Crossing Swords, Mickey Saves Christmas, and Marvel’s MODOK.* Stoopid Buddy is a pioneering independent studio that has helped drive the tremendous growth in adult animation over the past decade. Co-founder Eric Towner and Head of Development Chris Waters have deep roots in the Nouns ecosystem. Their first proposal funded the Nouns Rose Parade Float (seen by over 30 million people) and are producers of the forthcoming documentary about Nouns.

**Walter Newman**

Former SVP of program development at Adult Swim who oversaw such shows as Rick & Morty, Tuca and Bertie, Smiling Friends, Black Dynamite, and more. Walter brings network experience and a deep talent roster to the Nouns Stories team.

**Goldy** / **Pixel**

**[Goldy's](https://twitter.com/Goldypix)** Oscar-Shortlisted hybrid production studio is behind **[nounish ⌐◨-◨](https://twitter.com/nounish)** and the animated short film "**[The Wizards Hat](https://twitter.com/nouns_stories/status/1570433066900017152?s=20&t=T_vYbAun_YQEsZUlEwfjSA)**" from the original Nouns Stories proposal.

**Joshua Fisher**

Manager of Grammy-winning music producers, music publisher, SharkDAO Rep, Ugly Noun, The Nouns Square co-founder, Nouns DAO Builder and Nouns narrative advocate.

**Joel Cares**

CEO of **[Lobal Global](https://lobal.global/) / [ANOA](https://anoa.ca)**, creator of **[Nerman](https://twitter.com/nermanbot)**, founding member of **[Nouncil](http://nouncil.wtf/)**, creative director @ [**JoelCares.net**](https://joelcares.net).

## OUR ROLES

We’ve got the experience, knowledge, and relationships to successfully pull off this wildly ambitious proposal. Not only will we be identifying top-tier talent from our own networks of creators, but we’ll also be recruiting on a global scale to identify and onboard the next generation of up-and-coming animation talent.

We’ll be managing and coordinating a massive effort to create (literally) decentralized content and creatively packaging it in a way that connects with audiences around the globe. Not only that, but we’ll be tapping our extensive network to best position our exposure and distribution of the program online, at places like Annecy, and beyond. We’ll be coordinating a social media / marketing and PR strategy, as well as presenting “behind the scenes” access and status updates to the DAO as this undertaking fully develops.

## BEYOND THE PROP

The Nouns Stories team has over 613,620 hours of experience in animation development, production, marketing, distribution and sales. Our team is well positioned to take these Nounish creations beyond what is promised in the proposal. Our hope is we can continue to develop the best-of-the-best beyond their existence as a short, and seed Nounish content and characters into the mainstream zeitgeist. Think about it — *The Simpsons*, *South Park*, *Rick & Morty*, and hell, even *Robot Chicken*, all got their start **********as animated shorts.**********

## THAT’S A WRAP!

Animation drives cultural conversation. There’s a white space in animation that Nouns DAO is uniquely positioned to fill. Nimble development. Artist friendly. Global reach. We believe there’s a more “Nounish” way to produce the next great animated shorts, and that we have the team to help find them and make them. 

For Nouns, there’s an opportunity to be front-and-center in one of the most passionate arenas in pop culture and create break-out successes that proliferate the meme.

Our team has poured our hearts and souls into the Nouns experiment since it’s inception, and we’ve proven we can develop world-class animation and execute on ambitious ideas. We believe in a new way of generating content and organizing passionate communities of creators and fans. Together we can change the culture and build Nouns DAO into the next great destination for animation, so slap on your dang Noggles and let’s do this!!

# Sensuality in Art: Proposal for Funding a Transformative Project

The tone of the project will be one of inclusivity, respect, and open-mindedness. Our objective is to establish a new branch within the DAO, a more mature and secure space where artists can freely express their interpretations of nounish in art space. Simultaneously, we encourage the DAO to approach this topic with an open heart and mind. By promoting dialogue and understanding, we aim to challenge preconceived notions and nurture a more mature, accepting, and diverse community.



**Note:** The project's creators have chosen to maintain their anonymity, prioritizing a focus on the project's message and artistic vision rather than individual recognition. 



# First Shot : Sensuality

**Introduction:** In the world of art, sensuality has always played a vital role in evoking emotions, pushing societal boundaries, and expanding creative horizons. This proposal aims to investigate the profound connection between sensuality and art, while seeking funding for a project that celebrates and explores sensuality in various forms. By delving into this captivating topic, we aspire to craft a thought-provoking experience that visually engages and inspires the community. 
Keywords: Sensuality, art, community.

**Body:**

The proposed project aims to create seven immersive art pieces, each representing different expressions of sensuality applied to characteristic nouns, corresponding to the seven days of the week. By collaborating with four esteemed photography artists, our goal is to craft a visual experience that celebrates sensuality and its richness.

These pieces will be thoughtfully curated to explore various facets of sensuality, including its ties to human emotions and the natural world. Through meticulously designed works of art, we aim to prompt viewers to contemplate their own perceptions of sensuality and challenge societal norms surrounding this often-misunderstood concept.

To ensure the success of this project, we are seeking funding to cover several aspects, including artist fees, additional incentives, production, and the care of these pieces. By securing the necessary funds, we can provide artists and staff with the resources they require to create impactful and thought-provoking artworks.

Furthermore, this project aspires to extend beyond its initial phase. Future plans include organizing more immersive and expressive materials, enabling viewers to engage visually and musically.



**Rise of Sensuality:**

Sensuality, often considered taboo in many cultures, holds delicate curves and unique identity within the body. Art, in its purest form, serves as a means of self-expression for the body, a visual language.

Allow me to introduce one of the guest artists - [Guido](https://x.com/guidodisalle), a renowned name in photography, known for his aesthetic sensibilities and indescribable visual prowess.
